text: The Jungle Book (1994 movie) is a live action remake of The Jungle Book (1967 movie) that was made by the Walt Disney Company and was closer to The Jungle Book by Rudyard Kipling. It started Jason Scott Lee as Mowgli. In it, the animals donâ€™t talk. Category:1994 movies Category:Disney movies
title: The Jungle Book (1994 movie)
